thread.title: Video: Amy Schumer Tackles Gun Gontrol Issue on 'Saturday Night Live'
thread.title_full: Video: Amy Schumer Tackles Gun Gontrol Issue on 'Saturday Night Live'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Video: Amy Schumer Tackles Gun Gontrol Issue on 'Saturday Night Live'
text:
Comments In the wake of recent mass shootings, Schumer appears in a fake commercial that mocks gun enthusiasts on 'SNL'. 
Amy Schumer , an outspoken advocate for gun control, tackled the topic during her hosting stint on " Saturday Night Live " October 10. The comedienne appeared in a fake commercial that mocked gun enthusiasts. The mock ad showed how guns could be perfect accessory, toy and gift for every person in every situation. "Guns are there - in little moments and big ones. When things fall apart or it all comes together, they unite us, comfort us, bring us joy and strength - from first loves to new beginnings," it said. Meanwhile, in her monologue, Schumer talked about being a woman in Hollywood and riffed the Kardashians, whom she dubbed "a whole family of women that take the faces they were born with as a light suggestion." In another sketch, the Emmy-winning actress played a sexy teacher who seduced her student, played by Kyle Mooney. She also played a flight attendant with cast member Vanessa Bayer in "Delta Flight" sketch. The latest episode of "SNL" featured The Weeknd as a musical performer , with Nicki Minaj joining him for a surprise appearance.
